title: PairsWith
description: Connect with complementary brands and share customers through simple, trust-based partnerships for e-commerce businesses.

title: Automatic Recipe Adaptation Extension
description: Automatically adapts recipes you find online to fit your dietary and medical needs.

title: ThriftVision (Under Maintenance)
description: Application to help users find Depop clothes using a reverse image search engine to provide example clothing images.

title: Conversation Simulator Sample
description: The Gen AI Conversation Simulator is a versatile tool that leverages Amazon Bedrock and Polly to create interactive, voice-enabled conversation simulations. It serves as a practical starting point for developers looking to implement AI-driven dialogue systems for various applications, including call center training, interview preparation, and employee onboarding. By providing a working example of how to integrate AWS services for natural conversational interactions, this solution helps developers quickly build and customize their own conversation-based applications.
